articles.author: Christy Piña
articles.title: Sacha Baron Cohen and Isla Fisher Announce They’re Divorcing - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The couple, who first met at a party in Australia in 2000, had been married for 13 years and share three children.
articles.content:
Sacha Baron Cohen and Isla Fisher are getting divorced. 
The couple announced Friday in Instagram Stories on their respective accounts that they had filed for divorce in 2023 and were sharing the ne… [+2355 chars]
